Intro ...

Oh no! We have sales reps on the floor and they're going crazy. Some are running around wreaking havoc and not doing their jobs! Quick, HomeAdvisor needs a new leader, NOW!

You will play as Jim, a sales rep who doesn't participate in his peers bad habits. Jim believes in their potential and wants to see each individual thrive. Even though Jim has good intentions, he must lead himself first before leading others at HomeAdvisor.

Catch the LDP Modules, assignments and initiatives to build Jim's resume and brand to become the next great leader that HomeAdvisor needs. Watch out for distractions though that might hurt you along the way. Remember 3 strikes and you're out!
